name: Grid Overload
description:
Made for Mini Jam 100: Overload (Limitation: Chaos)

The premise is simple: fill the grid tiles using randomly generated tiles. You can "overload" a spot on the grid with multiple tiles to earn more points.

Do note, however, that you cannot place the main patterned tile on another pattern tile.

~~~

There are also other rules you must follow listed on the left of the screen! However, if you wish to be a little chaotic, you can change the rules. But remember, too much chaos can end up biting you in the butt!
